fr.gouv.vitam.common.server.application

Class AbstractVitamApplication<A extends VitamApplication<A,C>,C extends VitamApplicationConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.common.server.application.AbstractVitamApplication<A,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - VitamApplication final class
    C - VitamApplicationConfiguration final class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    VitamApplication<A,C>, VitamApplicationInterface<A,C>

    public abstract class AbstractVitamApplication<A extends VitamApplication<A,C>,C extends VitamApplicationConfiguration>
extends Object
implements VitamApplication<A,C>
    Abstract implementation of VitamApplication which handle common tasks for all sub-implementation

      protected AbstractVitamApplication(Class<C> configurationType, C configuration)

      protected MyApplication(C config) {
      super(MyApplication.class, MyApplicationConfiguration.class, config);
      }

        protected abstract boolean registerInAdminConfig(org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig resourceConfig)

        Parameters:
        resourceConfig - the ResourceConfig to setup
        Returns:
        return true if resource registered else return false this help to add or not the admin connector

                         boolean isAdminConnector)
                  throws VitamApplicationServerException
        To set extra filters
        Parameters:
        context - the context on which to call context.addFilter (as many times as needed)
        isAdminConnector - use to be able to add or not some specific filter or listener to the context
        Throws:
        VitamApplicationServerException

      • buildApplicationHandler

        protected org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler buildApplicationHandler()
                                                            throws VitamApplicationServerException
        Re Implement this method to construct your application specific handler if necessary.

        If extra register are needed, override the method getResources.
        If extra filter or action on context are needed, override setFilter.
        Returns:
        the generated Handler
        Throws:
        VitamApplicationServerException

        Returns:
        the generated Handler
        Throws:
        VitamApplicationServerException

      • getBusinessMetricsRegistry

        public static final VitamMetricRegistry getBusinessMetricsRegistry()
        Return the VitamMetricRegistry of VitamMetricsType.BUSINESS type. This VitamMetricRegistry can be used to register custom metrics wherever in the application.
        Returns:
        VitamMetrics BUSINESS VitamMetrics
